Sentencas: This paper reviews different thin-film deposition methods for oxides, especially for stabilized zirconia and compares them with regard to SOFC applications.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin electrolytes for second-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These methods will be classified into chemical, physical methods and ceramic powder processes.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin electrolytes for second-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Each method is described with its special technical features and examples of components for fuel cells are given.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin electrolytes for second-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: PVD and CVD methods are specially suited to depositing high-quality films of simple chemical compositions.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin electrolytes for second-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Liquid droplet methods and ceramic powder processes are more qualified for the deposition of complicated chemical compositions.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin electrolytes for second-generation solid oxide fuel cells
